Package io.papermc.paper.plugin.lifecycle.event.handler.configuration

package io.papermc.paper.plugin.lifecycle.event.handler.configuration
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    io.papermc.paper.plugin.lifecycle.event.handler
     
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    LifecycleEventHandlerConfiguration<O extends LifecycleEventOwner>
    Base type for constructing configured event handlers for lifecycle events.
    MonitorLifecycleEventHandlerConfiguration<O extends LifecycleEventOwner>
    Handler configuration for event types that allow "monitor" handlers.
    PrioritizedLifecycleEventHandlerConfiguration<O extends LifecycleEventOwner>
    Handler configuration that allows both "monitor" and prioritized handlers.
